name: InvasivePneumococcalDiseaseTestsForStreptococcusPneumoniaeInSpecimenFromNormallySterileSiteByCultureAndIdentificationMethod
title: Invasive Pneumococcal Disease (Tests for Streptococcus pneumoniae in Specimen from Normally Sterile Site by Culture and Identification Method)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names associated with Streptococcus pneumoniae in culture from a normally sterile site),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or observed.),(Inclusion Criteria: component: Streptococcus pneumoniae culture or isolate),(Exclusion Criteria: none)
